EmailTemplate.subject: You were nominated again - Five Star Professional Award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Your clients have nominated you again for this year's Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} Award!
We know how busy you are, for easy reference we uploaded your responses from last year, to make it easier for you to complete your candidate form. I also wanted to let you know of new criteria* we have added for the 2017 award program.
All candidates need to complete a candidate form to be considered for the award. Award winners will be featured with a complimentary listing on the Five Star Professional website, www.fivestarprofessional.com, and have the opportunity to appear in a special section of the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} issue of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
To complete your evaluation, you can access the link by clicking on "Your Form" below.
Candidate Evaluation Form - Click Here to Complete The deadline to submit is end of day {!Opportunity.ACDF_Deadline__c}
Award winners are scheduled to be notified within three to six weeks of the deadline.
If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call or send me an email.
*Blue Ribbon Panel - As part of the award evaluation all candidates will be reviewed by our Blue Ribbon panel of local real estate agents. As a member of the Blue Ribbon Panel you will be asked to take 15-20 minutes to review a portion of the candidate list. You will be asked to provide feedback on whether someone should be removed from consideration or someone should be added to the pool of candidates.
*10-minute Award Winner Certification appointment - Our new final step in our research process is a 10-minute Award Winner Certification appointment to determine that there have been no changes to your candidate form and also review the Award Usage Guidelines.
Thanks,
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
